text: QuickTime (also called QT) is a software made by Apple Inc. It can handle different types of digital video, media clips, sound, text, animation, music, and several types of interactive panoramic images. == Other websites == * Official QuickTime site with Download page, older versions, and additional components to extend QTs capabilities * QuickTime content * Apple's QuickTime developer site * From Alice to Ocean (first creative project demonstrating Quicktime 1.0) Category:Multimedia software Category:Graphics software Category:Apple software Category:MacOS
title: QuickTime
